name: criti-ai-monorepo
description: AI 기반 뉴스 신뢰도 분석 및 비판적 사고 훈련 플랫폼

scripts.install: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../challenge-web && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.dev:full: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:challenge"
scripts.build: cd shared && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cd ../challenge-web && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.build:frontend: cd shared && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.build:challenge: cd shared && npm run build && cd ../challenge-web && npm run build
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../challenge-web && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint

author: Criti AI 팀
